attributes.action: Stop the building of a motorway through the Gwent level 'soup of life'.
attributes.background:
The Gwent levels are a network of wetlands with such vast biodiversity that conservationists have compared it to that of the Amazon rainforest.
But plans are being made to Bury it under 14 miles of motorway concrete. Please stop the Welsh assembly giving the go ahead to this eco-destructive plan.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.  

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
